name: Big Brother: The Game
description:
The official game of the Big Brother TV show, Big Brother: The Game features all the psychological strategy, social dynamics and intrigue that has enthralled over 2 billion viewers globally with 7,000 Housemates over 480 series. Now, this season features the newest addition to the Big Brother House: YOU.

Entry to the competition is limited and the winner will be crowned in June 2021.

Big Brother: The Game is free to download. It has 2 modes – Contestant and Spectator mode. Spectator mode is always free and Spectators can become Contestants at any time. Contestants must purchase a token to enter the Big Brother House and compete to win the grand prize.

- CONTESTANT MODE-
Create your ultimate Big Brother contestant
Dress to impress and make your profile sparkle
Get to know your other real-life Housemates
Compete in contests to win Head of House
Do chores, complete secret missions or just relax and watch TV
Vote which nominee to evict
Stay in to win a life changing real cash prize

- SPECTATOR MODE -
Access the Live Stream from any House
Follow your friends, family or favourite celebrities
Send personalised gifts to players you love
Support your chosen Housemates in Public Votes

If you are experiencing any issues with download or playing, email support@bigbrother.game
